text: E.g. If I was reviewing a physics paper and the authors included some Brainfuck code as part of the publication, I'd probably request that they rewrite their analysis in something more commonly understood and used in the physics community (at least if that analysis were part of the paper itself and is meant to be read)

text:
Sure.
I think this example is a bit hyperbolic, though.
